name: The Sun Is Not Your Friend
name_original: The Sun Is Not Your Friend
description:
This game was made during the University of Edinburgh's GameDevSoc ChillJam in November 2016, over a period of 12 hours, using construct2. 

It tries to explore player interactions with a character using Bipolar Disorder to illustrate the clash between will and want. Eventually I'll make it into a branching resource management story oriented game, but for now this is what I made over the jam, and this is what's currently on the table.

This game is very far from being done, but it's a proof of concept of sorts. Eventually I'll finish it, and it'll be great. 

Comments are critiques are always appreciated

Arrow keys to move

E to interact
